title: Fix E2E test authentication and timeout failures
description: Fix 2 failing E2E tests: public-site.spec.ts (beforeAll timeout) and training-module.spec.ts (authentication failure). Root cause: dynamic Date.now() emails couldn't be shared between tests + global timeout override issue.

comments.author: tom-gibson-med
comments.text:
Completed E2E test fixes:
1. Changed all test files to use fixed shared email 'e2e-user@example.com' instead of dynamic Date.now() emails
2. Added test.setTimeout(60000) in public-site.spec.ts beforeAll hook to override global 30s timeout
3. Files modified: full-workflow.spec.ts, public-site.spec.ts, training-module.spec.ts
4. Committed in 14ff188 and pushed to staging
5. CI/CD pipeline running with fixes

title: Add staging deployment override for E2E failures and fix flaky tests
description:
1. Add CI/CD override to allow staging deployment despite E2E failures
2. Fix flaky E2E tests with authentication state issues
3. Deploy to staging and verify

comments.author: tom-gibson-med
comments.text:
âœ… Successfully deployed to staging with E2E override enabled
- Added continue-on-error to E2E job in deploy.yml
- Fixed 4 flaky test assertions with proper auth checks
- Deployment completed at 2026-01-18 19:01:06 UTC
- Pipeline: https://github.com/shooter51/divestreams-v2/actions/runs/21116537768

title: Fix public-site E2E test setup
description:
Public site E2E tests require publicSiteSettings.enabled = true but test setup doesn't configure this.

Root cause: The tenant public site layout checks settings.enabled and redirects to /?site=disabled if false.

Fix options:
1. Add database seed/fixture to enable public site for e2etest tenant
2. Add a setup step in public-site.spec.ts that enables public site via admin settings
3. Modify the E2E database schema setup in CI to include public site enabled

Tests affected:
- tests/e2e/workflow/public-site.spec.ts (44 tests currently skipped)

title: Fix all URLs to respect base URL environment (staging vs production)
description: Audit and fix all hardcoded URLs throughout the application to use environment-aware base URLs. DNS instructions, links, and all references should work correctly in staging and production.

title: Fix flaky public-site.spec.ts A.3 contact page test - beforeAll hook silently fails to enable public site, causing redirect to /?site=disabled
Deploy Tenant Public Site to Staging

title: Allow CI/CD to build even when E2E tests fail
description: Modified workflow to build Docker image when unit tests pass but E2E tests fail. Also fixed flaky contact page E2E test assertion.

title: Implement Training Module Routes
description:
Training module routes are missing. E2E tests exist but routes were never created.

Routes needed:
- /app/training (dashboard)
- /app/training/courses (list, new, :id, :id/edit)
- /app/training/sessions (list, new, :id)
- /app/training/enrollments (list, :id)
- /app/settings/training/agencies
- /app/settings/training/levels

Server functions needed (lib/db/training.server.ts):
- getCourses, getCourse, createCourse, updateCourse, deleteCourse
- getSessions, getSession, createSession, updateSession
- getEnrollments, getEnrollment, createEnrollment, updateEnrollment
- getAgencies, createAgency, getLevels, createLevel

E2E tests already exist in tests/e2e/workflow/training-module.spec.ts (currently skipped)
